basic.Peptide Name: mHR2(derived from SARS-CoV spike protein heptad repeat)
basic.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from SARS-CoV spike protein heptad repeat)
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.15150417]SARS-CoV:inhibition of virus infection in Vero cells(EC50>50 μM);murine coronavirus:inhibition of virus infection in Vero cells(EC50=0.9 ± 0.1 μM).
